member.name: T:Palladio.Attributes.DefaultAttributeHash
member.summary: A hashtable containing attributes which are associated to certain objects in other data structures. Those attributes need to have a type.

remarks.pre:
Version history:
$Log$ Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:31 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add
FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.
XmlSeffParser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
PerformanceCalculator: - Added interface IPerformanceCalculator. Added CalculatorFactory.
Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.
Revision 1.1 2005/06/03 09:33:43 helgeh *** empty log message ***
Revision 1.1 2005/05/18 21:35:09 helgeh *** empty log message ***
Revision 1.3 2005/04/08 08:11:09 joemal fix missing comment
Revision 1.2 2005/04/05 14:30:39 joemal implement the rest of the notification
Revision 1.1 2005/04/05 14:20:12 joemal initial class creation
Revision 1.1 2005/02/21 13:05:49 joemal initial import

FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.

member.name: M:Palladio.Attributes.IAttributeHash.Add(Palladio.Attributes.IAttributeType,Palladio.Attributes.IAttribute)
member.summary: Add the value of an attribute with the given type to this hashtable
member.param: The type of the attribute to add
The value of the attribute to add

member.name: M:Palladio.Attributes.IAttributeHash.Remove(Palladio.Attributes.IAttributeType)
member.summary: called to remove an attribute from the attributehash

member.name: E:Palladio.Attributes.IAttributeHash.AttributeChanged
member.summary: this event is fired if one of the attributes has been added, removed or changed

member.name: P:Palladio.Attributes.IAttributeHash.Item(Palladio.Attributes.IAttributeType)
member.summary: Gets a copy (!) of the value of the attribute with the specified type. To change the value, get a copy, change it and then add it again to the table.

member.name: F:Palladio.Attributes.DefaultAttributeHash.hashtable
member.summary: holds the hashtable with the attributes

member.name: M:Palladio.Attributes.DefaultAttributeHash.Add(Palladio.Attributes.IAttributeType,Palladio.Attributes.IAttribute)
member.summary: Add the value of an attribute with the given type to this hashtable
member.param: The type of the attribute to add
The value of the attribute to add

member.name: M:Palladio.Attributes.DefaultAttributeHash.Remove(Palladio.Attributes.IAttributeType)
member.summary: called to remove an attribute from the attributehash

member.summary: called to fire an AttributeChanged event

member.name: E:Palladio.Attributes.DefaultAttributeHash.AttributeChanged
member.summary: this event is fired if one of the attributes has been added, removed or changed

member.summary: Gets a copy (!) of the value of the attribute with the specified type. To change the value, get a copy, change it and then add it again to the table.

member.name: T:Palladio.Attributes.DefaultAttributesFactory
member.summary: Factory for creating objects of the interfaces in this namespace

remarks.pre:
Version history:
$Log$ Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:31 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add
FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.
XmlSeffParser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
PerformanceCalculator: - Added interface IPerformanceCalculator. Added CalculatorFactory.
Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.

member.name: T:Palladio.Attributes.DefaultAttributeType
member.summary: Stores information on the type of an attribute. The attribute type inherits IVisitable in order to e.g. allow specialised rendering of GUI elements to edit the value of the attribute.

remarks.pre:
Version history:
$Log$ Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:31 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add
FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.
XmlSeffParser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
PerformanceCalculator: - Added interface IPerformanceCalculator. Added CalculatorFactory.
Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.

member.name: T:Palladio.Attributes.IAttributeType
member.summary: Stores information on the type of an attribute. The attribute type inherits IVisitable in order to e.g. allow specialised rendering of GUI elements to edit the value of the attribute.

remarks.pre:
Version history:
$Log$ Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:31 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.
XmlSeffParser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.

Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate.
